root.name: Jurassic: The Hunted
root.description: Gameplay The gameplay and controls are very similar to Activision's popular Call of Duty franchise with small control differences, for example to sprint you need to click in and hold down the left stick. Another example is when you are being mauled by animals you attack with a quick time event instead of clicking the right stick. Â

similar_games.game: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie
Battle of Giants: Dinosaurs - Fight For Survival
